item.title: GenAI Azure Databricks - mind map - capabilities
item.author: Author
item.description: This mind map provides a detailed overview of the GenAI capabilities available in Azure Databricks. Also, check out the Azure Databricks Key Concepts mind map GenAI capabilities Azure Databricks mind map Azure Databricks Mind Map showcasing GenAI capabilities Figure 1: MLflow Mind Map visualizing core components Download the mind map in multiple formats: MindMap PNG MindMap JPG MindMap SVG

item.title: MLflow - mind map - core components
item.author: Author
item.description: This mind map offers a comprehensive overview of the core components of MLflow. An interesting fact about MLflow is that it was originally developed by Databricks, with which it maintains strong integration. MLflow Mind Map MLflow Mind Map showcasing core components Figure 1: MLflow Mind Map visualizing core components Download the mind map in multiple formats: MindMap PNG MindMap JPG MindMap SVG

item.title: Azure Databricks - mind map - key concepts
item.author: Author
item.description: As part of my recent deep dive into Azure Databricks, I’ve created a mindmap that outlines and connects some of its core concepts. This mindmap serves as a visual guide to help you navigate the powerful capabilities of Databricks and understand how its key components interrelate. Explore essential areas like: 📊 Data Management 🗄️: Centralized governance, cataloging, and access control. 🛠️ Data Engineering 📊: Tools for building data pipelines, notebooks, and version control.
